overview:
Jana Eisenstein is UK managing director at Videology, the UK’s highest reaching instream video ad platform. As UK Managing Director, Jana is responsbile for overseeing and management of deploying the application of Videology’s technology in the UK, across our client partners.

Jana was appointed as UK MD end November 2011 after having joined the company as Director of Publisher Services EMEA in Q4 2010. Prior to joining Videology, Jana was Director of Business Development and Partnerships at Microsoft Consumer and Online UK. Prior to Microsoft, Jana was part of the executive team of ScreenTonic SA, a pioneer in mobile advertising which was sold to Microsoft in late 2007.

Janaâ€™s earlier professional experience includes building and launching several European media and communication providers, with her earlier experience being in consulting with Gemini Consulting and Deloitte & Touche and originally in the financial services sector. She has an MBA from Western Business School, Ontario.
